html:
confirmeth the word of his servant. The Lord fulfills every prophecy made by his servants, the prophets (Luke 24:44; 2 Ne. 10:17; D&C 1:38).

Jerusalem, Thou shalt be inhabited/cities of Judah, Ye shall be built. This prophecy was to be fulfilled at least twice: once when Cyrus permitted the exiled Jews to return to their homeland, and again when the Jews return to their homeland in this dispensation. This latter fulfillment is occurring at the present time.
